DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : NEW INDEX TO INCLUDE BENTON OIL AND GAS
DOC.TEXT: Benton Oil and Gas Co. , an Oxnard-based petroleum exploration and production firm , said it has been chosen for inclusion in the S & P SmallCap 600 , a new stock index compiled by Standard & Poor ' s to follow the stock performance of 600 small-capitalization companies . Alex E . Benton , chief_executive of the company , said inclusion in the new index should bring the company " increased visibility , wider coverage by securities analysts and increased liquidity in its stock , as institutional investors create investment portfolios which mirror the index. " The index will be disseminated by Standard & Poor ' s starting Oct . 31 , Benton said . The median market capitalization of the 600 stocks is about $ 267 million . Benton said its current market capitalization is about $ 190 million . Benton has domestic operations in the Gulf Coast region of Louisiana , and international operations in Venezuela and Siberia .
